snippet: Donald J. Trump’s election will affect major issues facing António Guterres, including the Syrian war and how to preserve the United Nations’ funding and values....
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump’s election will affect major issues facing António Guterres, including the Syrian war and how to preserve the United Nations’ funding and values.

headline.main: António Guterres, Sworn In as U.N.’s Next Leader, Must Factor Trump Into His Plans
headline.print_headline: Sworn In, U.N.’s Next Leader Must Factor Trump Into Approach to Global Crises
